name: Zlam io
description:
Zlam io is a brand new io game that uses real 3D physics.

Slam your opponents with your elastic spiky weapon and take their points!
The more points you gain the more your weapon will grow!

Zlam io also offers an online leader-board! Get a high-score and it will be saved for everyone to see!
In this game you will find real 3D physics, awesome graphics and many skins to unlock!

Features:
- Easy game-play!
- Awesome graphics!
- Fantastic effects!
- No lag!
- Online leader-board!
